bike.description: High Modulus D-6 carbon w/RIB Tech, Integrated head tube w/1 1/2" lower, Integrated Aero seat tube, Internal cable routing, Oversized PIIS BB shell, Double water bottle mounts.. Rear triangle: High Modulus D-6 carbon thin seat stays, Oversized chain stay w/ETC and forged Aluminum drop out w/replaceable hanger

components.description: FC-330 Carbon Monocoque w/RIB Tech, Tapered Carbon steerer & carbon drop out
Shimano Dura Ace HollowTech II w/ Integrated Spindle, 39/53T
Shimano Dura Ace, F-Type-Braze On Mount
Shimano Dura Ace STI shifter/brake, 20-speed Flight Deck compatible
Oval W-945 Carbon Rim w/ Alloy Braking Surface, 58mm rim-700c, Sealed bearings
Vittoria Diamonte Pro II, 700x23c, Kevlar Bead-Folding
Oval RB-900 CNC Alloy Dual Pivot w/Swiss Stop Carbon Pads
FSA No. 42 1 1/8"U- 1 1/2"L Integrated, w/Carbon convex topcap
Oval R-900 Carbon Alloy matrix, 31.8mm, +/-6 degrees
Oval SR-900 Flat w/ Carbon rails
